page.title: 08Regional Government
page.content: Space for office expansion continues to be a major problem,and currently there are proposals to utilise part of Newtown Primary School for office accomodation. It is hoped that one day permanent accomodation will be built so that all regional authority departments will be centralised in the village. Few office workers actually live in the village, but the Region's presence does help the local shops and banks by increasing their trade.A number of local peaople have part-time ancillary employment as cleaners, catering assistants etc. A love-hate relationship exists between the village and the offices.
